title: Firefox 1.5
content: The new version of Mozilla Firefox, version 1.5, has just been released  [url=http://www.mozilla.com/firefox/]go get it[/url]! ([url=http://www.squarefree.com/burningedge/releases/1.5-comprehensive.html]what's new[/url])

title: Re: Firefox 1.5
content:
Hi Z. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

A new Firefox! I guess I'll have to upgrade, although I'm perfectly happy with Opera.Eat your veggies!
